title: Asian Stocks in Best-Ever Start to a Year, Currencies Strengthen
description: Asian stocks are having their best-ever start to a year, with the region’s currencies and bonds also rallying as investors seek opportunities outside the US.
content: Asian stocks are having their best-ever start to a year, with the region’s currencies and bonds also rallying as investors seek opportunities outside the US.
